Package com.salesforce.multicloudj.iam.driver

Interface Identity

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractIam, AwsIam, GcpIam
public interface Identity
Identity defines the contract for IAM operations across cloud providers. This interface represents the provider-agnostic API for managing identities (roles, service accounts, etc.) and their associated policies.

  • Method Details

    • createIdentity

      String createIdentity(String identityName, String description, String tenantId, String region, Optional<TrustConfiguration> trustConfig, Optional<CreateOptions> options)
      Creates a new identity (role or service account) in the cloud provider.
      Parameters:
      identityName - the name of the identity to create
      description - a description of the identity's purpose
      tenantId - the tenant/project/account ID
      region - the region where the identity should be created
      trustConfig - optional trust configuration (trust policy/principals)
      options - optional creation options (path, max session duration, etc.)
      Returns:
      the unique identifier (ARN, ID, etc.) of the created identity

    • attachInlinePolicy

      void attachInlinePolicy(PolicyDocument policyDocument, String tenantId, String region, String resource)
      Attaches an inline policy to an identity.
      Parameters:
      policyDocument - the policy document to attach
      tenantId - the tenant/project/account ID
      region - the region where the identity exists
      resource - the identity resource identifier

    • getInlinePolicyDetails

      String getInlinePolicyDetails(GetInlinePolicyDetailsRequest request)
      Retrieves the details of an inline policy attached to an identity.
      Parameters:
      request - the request containing identity name, policy name, role name, tenant ID, and region. Policy name and role name are optional and subject to cloud semantics.
      Returns:
      the policy document as a JSON string

    • getAttachedPolicies

      List<String> getAttachedPolicies(GetAttachedPoliciesRequest request)
      Lists all policies attached to an identity.
      Parameters:
      request - the request containing identity name, tenant ID, and region
      Returns:
      a list of policy names attached to the identity

    • removePolicy

      void removePolicy(String identityName, String policyName, String tenantId, String region)
      Removes a policy from an identity.
      Parameters:
      identityName - the name of the identity
      policyName - the name of the policy to remove
      tenantId - the tenant/project/account ID
      region - the region where the identity exists

    • deleteIdentity

      void deleteIdentity(String identityName, String tenantId, String region)
      Deletes an identity from the cloud provider.
      Parameters:
      identityName - the name of the identity to delete
      tenantId - the tenant/project/account ID
      region - the region where the identity exists

    • getIdentity

      String getIdentity(String identityName, String tenantId, String region)
      Retrieves information about an identity.
      Parameters:
      identityName - the name of the identity
      tenantId - the tenant/project/account ID
      region - the region where the identity exists
      Returns:
      identity information as a JSON string
